get-annotated-message: "includeMetadata" is boolean — consider an enum for clarity (e.g. "mode": "summary" | "full")
toggle-simulated-logging: "enabled" is boolean — consider an enum for clarity (e.g. "mode": "summary" | "full")
toggle-subscriber-updates: "enabled" is boolean — consider an enum for clarity (e.g. "mode": "summary" | "full")
get-annotated-message: optional parameter "messageStyle" has no default value

issues.fix: Add descriptions for each enum value in the parameter description, e.g. '"celsius" = metric, "fahrenheit" = imperial'
